thread.title: Vancouver news: Car crashes into dental office | CTV News
thread.title_full: Vancouver news: Car crashes into dental office | CTV News

author: @CTVVancouver
title: Vancouver news: Car crashes into dental office | CTV News
text: A vehicle crashed through the front window of a dental clinic in downtown Vancouver Thursday afternoon. Yellow caution tape has gone up outside of Wall Centre Dental on Hornby Street, where shattered glass litters the sidewalk. Police are on scene and CTV News has contacted first responders for more information – including whether or not anyone was injured. Seven years later, zoo staff made a surprising discovery: Gen-chan, now 12, was female.
